description:
Ashibe’s Grandpa brings Ashibe and all the employees to see Sugao, but they get lost along the way.
Unable to wait, Sugao and his father go looking for them but they get lost as well.
Ashibe finally arrives at Sugao’s house only to find out Sugao is not there...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スガオくんに会いにいこう!
